title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 April 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:09 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
00:51 <polx> has quit  
01:49 <jvdrean> has quit  
02:17 <Shaddox> has quit  
02:28 <DrLou\_> has quit

04:05 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki

05:07 <sburjan`> has quit  
06:58 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:02 <sdumitriu> has quit  
08:40 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <evalica> has quit  
09:45 <jvdrean> has quit  
09:45 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:55 <Shaddox> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <Shaddox> has quit  
10:00 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:04 <mflorea> has quit  
10:05 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:29 <vmassol> good morning!  
10:29 <vmassol> updating http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap, tmortagne the release is tomorrow right?  
10:29 <vmassol> or today?  
10:30 <vmassol> (forgot we were Tuesday ;))  
10:30 <vmassol> ok found the mail it's today  
10:32 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <+tmortagne> vmassol: the release is supposed to be today  
11:05 <vmassol> ok maybe we should round up everyone, see what still needs to be done before the release  
11:05 <+tmortagne> was finishing mails a stuff and about to start checking jenkins etc.  
11:05 <vmassol> anyone who has stuff to commit?  
11:05 <vmassol> jvdrean: what's the state of the "hide tech content" feature?  
11:06 <+Enygma`> I`m looking at the failing test after my commit last night  
11:06 <vmassol> I cannot build XE  
11:06 <vmassol> installers fail to build now  
11:06 <vmassol> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-antrun-plugin:1.7:run (run-launch4j) on project xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows: An Ant BuildException has occured: net.sf.launch4j.BuilderException: net.sf.launch4j.ExecException: Exec failed(2): [Ljava.lang.String;@43ef0f7a  
11:06 <vmassol> [ERROR] around Ant part ...<launch4j configFile="/Users/vmassol/dev/xwiki/git/xwiki-enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-installers/xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows/target/classes/launch4j.xml"/>... @ 8:164 in /Users/vmassol/dev/xwiki/git/xwiki-enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-installers/xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows/target/antrun/build-main.xml  
11:07 <vmassol> "Launch of "windres" failed: the PowerPC architecture is no longer supported." hmmmm  
11:07 <+tmortagne> did not seen any commit around installers  
11:07 <vmassol> I'm not on powerpc! ;)  
11:07 <+tmortagne> :)  
11:08 <+tmortagne> were you able to build installers before ?  
11:08 <vmassol> I think so  
11:08 <vmassol> that's the strange part  
11:08 <vmassol> if before = a few days ago => I think so  
11:08 <vmassol> if befre = several months ago => definitely  
11:09 <vmassol> I'll dig  
11:09 <vmassol> testing some new feature of XE first...  
11:09 <vmassol> (I'm testing hide tech content UI)  
11:10 <vmassol> I think we have a bug to fix  
11:10 <vmassol> when I start XE  
11:10 <vmassol> it does a migration  
11:10 <vmassol> that doesn't look normal  
11:10 <vmassol> "Current storage version = [40000] "  
11:10 <vmassol> I've just build it from master  
11:11 <vmassol> how come?  
11:11 <+jvdrean> vmassol: I'd prefer 4.0rc1 to be shipped with what's been committed about hidden docs, I started the feature branch to be able to discuss/expose what I'd like to merge in 4.1M1  
11:11 <vmassol> jvdrean: no API change?  
11:12 <vmassol> jvdrean: I'm testing setting the hidden field but can't find the UI  
11:13 <+jvdrean> addition of getFilter/setFilter in Query  
11:13 <vmassol> what about that?  
11:13 <+jvdrean> the UI + api.Document modifications are also in the branch  
11:13 <vmassol> what?  
11:14 <vmassol> aer you kidding?  
11:14 <vmassol> :)  
11:14 <vmassol> let me ask something  
11:14 <vmassol> how do I hide a doc in master now?  
11:14 <vmassol> this feature is for 4.0  
11:14 <vmassol> not 4.1  
11:14 <vmassol> we \*never\* discussed moving it to 4.1  
11:15 <vmassol> so I don't understand  
11:15 <+jvdrean> we did, we talked about having the base mechanism in 4.0, but not used  
11:15 <vmassol> let me repeat  
11:15 <vmassol> how do I hide a doc in master now?  
11:15 <+jvdrean> you can't  
11:15 <vmassol> so the feature is NOT in  
11:15 <vmassol> it has no value whatsoever  
11:16 <+jvdrean> yes  
11:16 <vmassol> what's in?  
11:16 <vmassol> I do'nt understand  
11:16 <+jvdrean> nothing then  
11:16 <vmassol> that was the only thing to do  
11:16 <vmassol> what is "base mechanism" you're talking about?  
11:17 <vmassol> BTW "not used" doesn't mean it's not there.. it means it's … not used...  
11:17 <+jvdrean> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6bee761a9deb2497d06eb11893611f6baa563eb9  
11:17 <+jvdrean> this has been commited in master  
11:18 <vmassol> so get/setFilter are there  
11:18 <vmassol> so what's missing is that we cannot set a hidden doc, right?  
11:19 <vmassol> not even programmatically  
11:19 <vmassol> (unless you have PR maybe ?)  
11:19 <+jvdrean> yes, same as before, there's only XWikiDocument#setHidden  
11:19 <vmassol> I still don't understand why you haven't committed whatw e agreed on  
11:19 <vmassol> ie the ability to set the hidden flag on a doc  
11:20 <vmassol> that makes it so much easier to use it  
11:20 <vmassol> if we don't have this I don't see how users are going to use it  
11:20 <+jvdrean> Modifications to Document (+UI) are in the branch https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/compare/master...feature-hidden-documents  
11:20 <vmassol> and if nobody uses it I don't see the value of having only what you committed  
11:21 <vmassol> jvdrean: that branch is about using it  
11:21 <vmassol> we said we didn't want that  
11:21 <vmassol> BUT  
11:21 <vmassol> you mixed erveytthing  
11:21 <vmassol> you've also put new api there  
11:21 <vmassol> which is planned for 4.0  
11:21 <vmassol> so you've mixed 4.0 and 4.1  
11:22 <vmassol> we said you would have this in 4.0 with a simple example  
11:23 <+tmortagne> release note created, please fill your stuff and things I forgot  
11:23 <+jvdrean> vmassol: everything is mixed when doing  a global compare  
11:23 <+jvdrean> but there are individual commits  
11:23 <vmassol> ok we still need to talk about why we cannot have this in 4.0  
11:24 <vmassol> (not the usage)  
11:27 <+tmortagne> note: starting tomorrow I won't be available for a release until next Wednesday so if we need to delay the release it will have to be done by someone else  
11:46 <vmassol> talking to JV  
11:46 <vmassol> tmortagne: you're on holidays?  
11:46 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yep  
11:46 <+tmortagne> I mean starting tomorrow  
11:46 <+tmortagne> not today  
11:47 <vmassol> after talking to JV, JV needs 1/2 day to commit his latest stuff  
11:48 <vmassol> tmortagne: you could do the release tomorrow?  
11:48 <+tmortagne> vmassol: I'm on the road the whole day tomorrow  
11:48 <vmassol> (not sure I understood)  
11:48 <vmassol> ah ok  
11:48 <+tmortagne> only today  
11:49 <vmassol> ok so I think we could do this:  
11:49 <vmassol> - leave 1 hour for JV to commit his latest stuff  
11:49 <+tmortagne> I can maybe do the maven release this evening if jvdrean commit early enough  
11:49 <+tmortagne> but will be short for the paper work  
11:49 <vmassol> - leave 2-3 hours for the build to build  
11:49 <vmassol> - start releasing around 15:00-16:00  
11:49 <vmassol> - you only do the maven release  
11:50 <vmassol> - someone else continues tomorrow the rest of the release  
11:50 <vmassol> I personally think that the hiding tech content feautre is important to have in 4.0 as planned  
11:50 <vmassol> wdyt?  
11:51 <+tmortagne> yep it's a nice thing to put in the 4.0 release note  
11:51 <vmassol> it's just the mechanism (it won't be used) but it's still nice to have  
11:51 <+tmortagne> yep  
12:06 <CIA-120> Eduard Moraru master \* r0ea7e72 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0ea7e726dcfcce124e6cb8477412ad04eae3ffa3 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-annotations/xwiki-platform-annotation-io/src/main/java/org/xwiki/annotation/internal/CheckAnnotationClassEventListener.java : [Annotations] ...  
12:11 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:33 <vmassol> so the status is that JV is going to commit his stuff in the coming 2 hours  
13:01 <mflorea> has quit  
13:19 <+tmortagne> ok  
13:32 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* rf7c6b25 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f7c6b252006e9c4d2fc3d2fcb85ca450b26dab65 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-script/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/script/internal/ExtensionManagerScriptService.java : XWIKI-7700: Give public script access to job status for a specific extension id - http://git.io/zm66OA  
13:47 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* r3d057b3 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/3d057b3b522b71af10d7964647fa27a6c83bd46d / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-job/src/main/java/org/xwiki/job/internal/DefaultJobStatusStorage.java : Improve codestyle - http://git.io/goAtcQ  
13:50 <CIA-120> Jean-Vincent Drean feature-hidden-documents \* rded8102 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ded8102f10d4569e0aa750daad0d60621bce854c / (13 files): Revert "XWIKI-7568 : Implement mechanism to hide technical content" ...  
13:54 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* r0259186 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/0259186febccdd3d3a945402008157109f6b7d7f / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-component/xwiki-commons-component-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/component/manager/ComponentManager.java : Fix javadoc and use the proper role annotation - http://git.io/m3fC3w  
13:55 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:02 <vmassol> guys, could you give your vote on "[VOTE] Change our Maven POM Names and Description for Extension Manager" when you get 2 minutes?  
14:02 <vmassol> (only marius has voted so far)  
14:31 <CIA-120> Jean-Vincent Drean feature-hidden-documents \* r410c3bc https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/410c3bc03298668714e17fd8b8beacc40529870c / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7568 : Implement mechanism to hide technical content ...  
14:40 <CIA-120> Jean-Vincent Drean feature-hidden-documents \* r96de01a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/96de01a464f56ec8dc473148b6516f321c085444 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-query/xwiki-platform-query-manager/src/main/java/org/xwiki/query/internal/ScriptQuery.java : [minor] Fixed string formatting - http://git.io/A5pj5A  
14:41 <CIA-120> Jean-Vincent Drean master \* r96de01a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/96de01a464f56ec8dc473148b6516f321c085444 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-query/xwiki-platform-query-manager/src/main/java/org/xwiki/query/internal/ScriptQuery.java : [minor] Fixed string formatting (+5 more commits...) - http://git.io/A5pj5A  
14:57 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
15:01 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:21 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* r47de856 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/47de856c3ff287a1cdd3c11ecd33d2126f64cef4 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources\_sv.properties : Update translations - http://git.io/s6ZnLA  
15:23 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* r7a8d2a7 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/7a8d2a758455bd56958c7a7698ec298803bf1494 / xwiki-enterprise-ui/src/main/resources/Main/Welcome.fr.xml : Update translations - http://git.io/iVQNqA  
15:40 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
16:07 <+tmortagne> waiting for XE/XEM tests to pass and will start the release  
16:23 <vmassol> tmortagne: lots of infinispan errors on http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/1247/testReport/junit/xwiki-enterprise-ui-all-4.0-SNAPSHOT/xar/ArchiveSuite/  
16:24 <vmassol> it's not the root cause though  
16:24 <vmassol> but still would be interesting to understand why it happens  
16:33 <abusenius> has quit  
16:44 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:49 <+tmortagne> vmassol: I have seen it but not idea what cause this, I started the test again and no error this time  
16:49 <vmassol> k….  
16:49 <vmassol> 'm testing manually XE now  
16:49 <vmassol> just finished reubild it  
16:49 <+tmortagne> ok  
16:50 <+tmortagne> currently waiting for test-ui to finish on jenkins  
16:50 <vmassol> ok  
16:50 <vmassol> tmortagne: there's still the issue I mentioned with db version  
16:50 <vmassol> we need someone to look at this  
16:51 <vmassol> it's not criticial but it's annoying  
16:51 <+tmortagne> vmassol: you mean that the hsqldb created durring the build does not already have the proper version set ?  
16:51 <vmassol> yes  
16:52 <+tmortagne> hmm I may have an idea actually  
16:52 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: you added a migration, right ?  
16:53 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:53 <vmassol> yes he added one  
16:54 <+tmortagne> I guess the issue is that it's not in oldcore and that the module in which this migration is is not in the class path when the database is built by packager plugin  
16:54 <vmassol> the migration is "R40001XWIKI7540 - See http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7540"  
16:56 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: where is this migration located ?  
16:57 <+tmortagne> we had the same issue already for another module and we moved the migration to oldcore  
16:57 <+tmortagne> jenkins is all blue, starting the maven release  
16:58 <vmassol> jvdrean: I can't find a lpace where to set the hidden flag when editing a doc  
17:06 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: the release script is taking care of creating the x.n+1 branch when releasing a RC ?  
17:08 <+tmortagne> looks like it does  
17:08 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
17:09 <+tmortagne> ok thanks  
17:09 <vmassol> tmortagne: hold on 5mn if you can  
17:09 <vmassol> I'm testing and I've found a small issue  
17:09 <+tmortagne> I can cancel  
17:09 <vmassol> dsicussing with JV  
17:09 <+tmortagne> on commons ?  
17:09 <vmassol> it may not be worth it to cancel  
17:09 <vmassol> not on commons  
17:09 <+tmortagne> ok then I let commons continue then  
17:19 <+Enygma`> tmortagne: org.xwiki.annotation.io.internal.migration.hibernate.R40001XWIKI7540DataMigration  
17:19 <+Enygma`> sorry, did not see your messages  
17:19 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: I mean in which module  
17:19 <+Enygma`> xwiki-platform-annotation-io  
17:19 <+tmortagne> but given the package name I guess it's not oldcore  
17:20 <+tmortagne> so that's probably the issue  
17:20 <vmassol> yep  
17:20 <+Enygma`> I did not understand the issue from the lines above  
17:20 <+Enygma`> why is it causing problems?  
17:20 <vmassol> Enygma`: the default distrib doesn't have your migrator applied  
17:20 <vmassol> \*default standalone distrib  
17:20 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: it's not big problem but since you migration in not in the classpath when creating the database the version is wrong  
17:20 <vmassol> on the generated DB  
17:21 <+tmortagne> so it's not very nice to see a migration executed at started where it's actually useless  
17:21 <vmassol> so when peopole download the distrib  
17:21 <vmassol> and they run it, they have the migration executing the first time  
17:21 <+tmortagne> s/started/startup/  
17:22 <+Enygma`> but annotations are bundled by default  
17:22 <+Enygma`> why isn`t it in the classpath?  
17:22 <vmassol> tmortagne: we should be able to set the DB version manually I think. We shouldn't need to depend on lots of modules in the packager itself…. wdyt?  
17:22 <C\_Kode> has joined #xwiki  
17:22 <vmassol> Enygma`: the DB version is curerntly set in the packager plugin AFAIK  
17:23 <+tmortagne> Enygma`: it's bundled in XE yes  
17:23 <+tmortagne> but we don't execute the packager with all the XE dependencies  
17:23 <+tmortagne> just what's needed to import a xar  
17:23 <+Enygma`> right...  
17:24 <+Enygma`> well, from the annotation application's point of view, it should be "normal", right?  
17:24 <+Enygma`> since it's supposed to be an application  
17:25 <vmassol> yep  
17:28 <C\_Kode> Hi. Charting in xwiki.  I have numbers along with dates.  WHen I try to include the dates for the numbers to be plotted with, it says the date is an invalid number.  
17:29 <CIA-120> Jean-Vincent Drean master \* rc0c3391 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c0c33910591874029c105dffc1f876f7f18dd2ab / (3 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-7568 : Implement mechanism to hide technical content ...  
17:31 <C\_Kode> http://codepad.org/CRBgCKc6  
17:32 <vmassol> C\_Kode: I don't the chart macro too well but if you could paste us what your code generates, we could check it out  
17:32 <C\_Kode> The error: http://codepad.org/ibQ5IUW3  
17:33 <+tmortagne> the error is saying that it expect a number and you gave it something that is not a number ("2012-02-21")  
17:33 <C\_Kode> vmassol: Are what I posted (the code, and the error) enough to look at or was there something else specific you would need to see  
17:33 <vmassol> jvdrean: are you all done now? Can tmortagne continue releasing platform now?  
17:33 <+tmortagne> you probably gave a date where you should actually give a number for I don't know what exactly  
17:34 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yep, he told me already  
17:34 <vmassol> C\_Kode: Your first paste uses groovy code to query a DB. Ofc I cannot run this locally  
17:34 <vmassol> we'd need to see what groovy generates for the chart macro to use as input  
17:34 <C\_Kode> +tmortange It seems to be expecting a number, but a date is what it's supposed to get  
17:34 <C\_Kode> Ok  
17:35 <+tmortagne> well it's not what the macro code think at least :)  
17:35 <+tmortagne> maybe it's a bug  
17:36 <+tmortagne> I don''t know this macro very well either  
17:36 <+jvdrean> vmassol: yep (I sent a PM to tmortagne)  
17:38 <C\_Kode> Anyway.  It was supposed to be plotting a size in GB of data to a date the data size snapshot was taken.  So we could plot the growth of the data.  The chart macro just doesn't like it. :/  
17:38 <vmassol> C\_Kode: if you can paste your chart macro data maybe we could help  
17:39 <CIA-120> Thomas Mortagne xwiki-commons-4.0-rc-1 \* ra5b3ff9 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/a5b3ff909b790eb6e2a2beb5ad421c1d26eec4c1 / pom.xml : [release] Preparing release xwiki-commons-4.0-rc-1 - http://git.io/o0PXQw

17:43 <C\_Kode> sec, have to register  
17:44 <vmassol> wait  
17:44 <vmassol> no need to register  
17:44 <vmassol> http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Vincent?viewer=code  
17:47 <C\_Kode> That looks right  
17:47 <C\_Kode> Yep.  Produces the same error too.  
17:47 <vmassol> the error is normal
